divs: Sighting DetailsOK-- I'm outside again videoing the stars and this large brite UFO coming out from the West of monterey Bay I turn my video camera to film it. I was very suprize of the size and how low it was going across the sky. It was about7pm could not hear any motor noise as it went by... Would like to know if anyone seen this one...this was much different from what I been videoing.....and I have seen alot! OK guys from MUFON my colded is over so call me again to come over to view Videos..
Summary: Large white/red light it was large as a commercial airline coming from the west of Monterey Bay going south east through it was a comet? Have this on Video! all most called 911----
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Seaside
There were no other sightings in Seaside on or around March 1st 2012
